claims.claim: AI healthcare market experiencing explosive growth with 524% projected increase
claims.quote: The AI in healthcare market isn't just growing, it's exploding. Valued at $32.3 billion in 2024, it's projected to surge more than 524% to $208 billion by 2030.

claims.claim: Mainstream adoption with 80% of hospitals using AI for patient care and workflow efficiency
claims.quote: Eighty percent of hospitals report using AI to improve patient care and workflow efficiency, while 75% of leading healthcare companies are actively scaling generative AI use cases.

claims.claim: 28% of healthcare work hours could be transformed by large language models
claims.quote: In healthcare, 28% of all work hours could be transformed by large language models (LLMs), according to Accenture.

claims.claim: AI systems cut cycle times by 30-50% and boost case throughput 5-10x on narrow tasks
claims.quote: When the data pipelines and guardrails are in place, teams cut cycle times by 30–50%, boost case throughput (often 5–10× on narrow tasks), and lift quality with auditable, reproducible outputs.

claims.claim: Malteser achieved meaningful time savings and faster responses using Microsoft 365 Copilot
claims.quote: Result: meaningful time back to frontline and back-office teams, faster responses to clients and colleagues, and more focus on mission-critical work.
